passes.description: Ensures the order of headings is semantically correct

ancestry: html > body > main:nth-child(9) > div > div:nth-child(1) > h1
html > body > footer:nth-child(10) > div:nth-child(1) > div > div > div > div > div > h3:nth-child(1)
html > body > footer:nth-child(10) > div:nth-child(2) > div > div > div:nth-child(2) > div > h5:nth-child(1)
